btkSimulateLowResolutionImage.cxx

00035 
00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00041 
00042 #include "itkImage.h"
00043 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00044 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00045 
00046 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00047 
00048 #include "itkTransformFileReader.h"
00049 #include "itkTransformFactory.h"
00050 #include "btkSliceBySliceTransform.h"
00051 
00052 #include "btkSuperResolutionImageFilter.h"
00053 
00054 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00055 
00056 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00057 {
00058 
00059   try {
00060 
00061   const char *inputFile = NULL;
00062   const char *maskFile  = NULL;
00063   const char *transformFile = NULL;
00064   const char *simFile  = NULL;
00065   const char *refFile  = NULL;
00066 
00067   // Parse arguments
00068 
00069   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Resample a set of images using the injection method", ' ', "Unversioned");
00070 
00071   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Low-resolution image file.",true,"","string",cmd);
00072   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> maskArg("m","mask","Low-resolution image mask file.",false,"","string",cmd);
00073   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> refArg  ("r","reconstructed","Reconstructed image. "
00074       "Typically the output of btkImageReconstruction is used." ,true,"","string",cmd);
00075   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg  ("o","output","Super resolution output image",true,"","string",cmd);
00076   TCLAP::SwitchArg  boxcarSwitchArg("","boxcar","A boxcar-shaped PSF is assumed as imaging model"
00077       " (by default a Gaussian-shaped PSF is employed.).",false);
00078 
00079   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> transArg("t","transform","transform file",false,"","string",cmd);
00080 
00081 
00082   // Parse the argv array.
00083   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00084 
00085   inputFile = inputArg.getValue().c_str();
00086   maskFile = maskArg.getValue().c_str();
00087   refFile = refArg.getValue().c_str();
00088   simFile = outArg.getValue().c_str();
00089   transformFile = transArg.getValue().c_str();
00090 
00091   // typedefs
00092   const   unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00093   typedef btk::SliceBySliceTransform< double, Dimension > TransformType;
00094   itk::TransformFactory<TransformType>::RegisterTransform();
00095 
00096   typedef float  PixelType;
00097 
00098   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >  ImageType;
00099   typedef ImageType::Pointer                  ImagePointer;
00100   typedef std::vector<ImagePointer>           ImagePointerArray;
00101 
00102   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, Dimension >  ImageMaskType;
00103   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType > MaskReaderType;
00104   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< Dimension > MaskType;
00105 
00106   typedef ImageType::RegionType               RegionType;
00107   typedef std::vector< RegionType >           RegionArrayType;
00108 
00109   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >   ImageReaderType;
00110   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >   WriterType;
00111 
00112   typedef itk::TransformFileReader     TransformReaderType;
00113   typedef TransformReaderType::TransformListType * TransformListType;
00114 
00115   typedef btk::SuperResolutionImageFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  ResamplerType;
00116   ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00117 
00118   // Filter setup
00119 
00120   ImageType::IndexType  roiIndex;
00121   ImageType::SizeType   roiSize;
00122 
00123   // add image
00124   ImageReaderType::Pointer imageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00125   imageReader -> SetFileName( inputFile );
00126   imageReader -> Update();
00127   resampler   -> AddInput( imageReader -> GetOutput() );
00128 
00129   // add region
00130   if ( strcmp(maskFile,"") != 0 )
00131   {
00132     MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00133     maskReader -> SetFileName( maskFile );
00134     maskReader -> Update();
00135 
00136     MaskType::Pointer mask = MaskType::New();
00137     mask -> SetImage( maskReader -> GetOutput() );
00138 
00139     RegionType roi = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00140     roiIndex = roi.GetIndex();
00141     roiSize  = roi.GetSize();
00142 
00143   } else
00144       {
00145         roiSize  = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00146         roiIndex = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00147       }
00148 
00149   RegionType imageRegion;
00150   imageRegion.SetIndex(roiIndex);
00151   imageRegion.SetSize (roiSize);
00152   resampler -> AddRegion( imageRegion );
00153 
00154 
00155   if ( strcmp(transformFile,"") != 0 )
00156   {
00157     TransformReaderType::Pointer transformReader = TransformReaderType::New();
00158     transformReader -> SetFileName( transformFile );
00159     transformReader -> Update();
00160 
00161     TransformListType transforms = transformReader->GetTransformList();
00162     TransformReaderType::TransformListType::const_iterator titr = transforms->begin();
00163     TransformType::Pointer trans = dynamic_cast< TransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() );
00164 
00165     for(unsigned int j=0; j< trans -> GetNumberOfSlices(); j++)
00166       resampler -> SetTransform(0, j, trans -> GetSliceTransform(j) ) ;
00167   }
00168 
00169 
00170   // Set reference image
00171 
00172   ImageReaderType::Pointer refReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00173   refReader -> SetFileName( refFile );
00174   refReader -> Update();
00175 
00176   resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00177   resampler -> SetReferenceImage( refReader -> GetOutput() );
00178 
00179   if ( boxcarSwitchArg.isSet() )
00180     resampler -> SetPSF( ResamplerType::BOXCAR );
00181   resampler -> CreateH();
00182 
00183   // Write simulated image
00184 
00185   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();
00186   writer -> SetFileName( simFile );
00187   writer -> SetInput( resampler -> GetSimulatedImage(0) );
00188 
00189   if ( strcmp(simFile,"") != 0)
00190   {
00191     std::cout << "Writing " << simFile << " ... ";
00192     writer -> Update();
00193     std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00194   }
00195 
00196   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00197   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00198 
00199   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00200 }
